Printing Items

On the Windows client, you can print the item list that appears in the upper pane of the project view window.

To print the data displayed in the upper pane:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select a component tab to display data in the upper pane.

  3. If the data in the upper pane is in tree format, click the List Display button on the toolbar to use the list format.

  4. Verify that the rows and columns of information you want to print appear in the upper pane.

  5. Select the rows to be printed.

  6. Select Print from a component or context menu. The application prepares a default report on the selected rows of items and prints that report.

Note: The Cross-Platform client does not have a Print menu option for items. However, you can create and print a report containing item properties.
